content: अत्यंत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अतिक्रांतः अंतं सीमां नाशं] {@--1@} Excessive, much, very great or strong; °वैरं great enmity; °मैत्री; °हिमोत्किरानिलाः <ls>Ku. 5. 26.</ls> {@--2@} Complete, perfect, absolute; °अभावः absolute non-existence; See below. {@--3@} Endless, perpetual, permanent, everlasting, uninterrupted, unbroken; किं वा तवात्यंतवियोगमोघे हतजीविते <ls>R. 14. 65</ls>; भवत्यजरमत्यंतं <ls>Pt. 1. 151</ls>; °तं सुखमश्नुते <ls>Ms. 5. 46</ls>; <ls>Bg. 6. 28</ls>; कस्यात्यंतं सुखमुपनतं <ls>Me. 109</ls>; नायमत्यंतसंवासो लभ्यते येन केनचित् <ls>H. 4. 73.</ls> --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Exceedingly, excessively, very much, to the highest degree; स्थायीभवति चात्यंतं रागः शुक्लपटे यथा <ls>Pt. 1. 33</ls>; °शिशु <ls>Mu. 4. 14</ls> very young. {@--2@} For ever, to the end (of life), through life; अत्यंतमात्मसदृशेक्षणवल्लभाभिराहो निवत्स्यति <ls>Ś. 1. 27</ls> for all time, in perpetuity; सा चात्यंतमदर्शनं नयनयोर्याता <ls>V. 4. 2.</ls>; oft in <ab>comp.</ab>; °गता See below; प्रियमत्यंतविलुप्तदर्शनं <ls>Ku. 4. 2</ls> for ever lost to view; <ls>R. 14. 49.</ls> {@--3@} Absolutely, perfectly, completely.
